Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: SHRI BHAGVATI STANZA
She was looking like the Lakshmi of the kings
She was glorious like the beautiful damsels of Madra Desha.293.
She might be Sita, or the prowess of the kings, or the chief queen of some king or the moving figure behind Ram.294.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਬਲਰਾਮ ਦੀ ਭੈਣ ('ਰਾਮਾਨੁਜਾ') (ਭਾਵ ਸੁਭਦ੍ਰਾ) ਹੈ ॥੨੯੪॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She might be Yamuna, united with the glory of the god of love
She was like the goddess of the goddesses and the heavenly damsel of the demons.295.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਦੈਂਤਾ (ਦੇ ਗੁਰੂ ਦੀ) ਇਸਤਰੀ (ਅਥਵਾ ਰਾਣੀ) ਹੈ ॥੨੯੫॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was looking like Savitri, Gayatri, the supreme goddess amongst the goddesses and the chief queen amongst the queens.296.
She was a princess skilful in mantras and tantras and seemed like Hansani (a female swan).297.
Looking like the heated gold in fife, she seemed like Shachi, the wife of Indra

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਸੋਨੇ ਦੀ ਲਿਸ਼ਕ ਪੈਦਾ ਹੋਈ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: It seemed that Brahma had himself created her.298.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਬ੍ਰਹਮਾ ਦੀ ਬਣਾਈ ਹੋਈ ਹੈ ॥੨੯੮॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was like Lakshmi and supremely glorious
She was pure like the sunrays.299.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਸਾਵਿਤ੍ਰੀ (ਅਥਵਾ ਸੂਰਜ ਦੀ ਕਿਰਨ) ਹੈ ॥੨੯੯॥
ਜਾ ਬਿਜਲੀ (ਨੇ ਦੇਹ ਧਾਰੀ ਹੋਈ ਹੈ)

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was mercurial like the sexual arts
She was looking splendid like Rajeshwari or was like a specially like Gauri-Parvati.301.
She was like the beloved queen of Ram and glorious like Gauri-Parvati.301.
She was superb amongst the arts of kingdom and looked like the youthful spring and seemed like the rosary of Raginis (the female musical modes).302.
She looked like Megh-Malhar, or Gauri Dhamar or the daughter of Hindol, descending from the sky.303.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਆਕਾਸ਼ ਤੋਂ ਉਤਰੀ ਹੋਈ (ਪਰੀ) ਹੈ ॥੩੦੩॥
ਜਾ ਪਾਰ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਨ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,
ਜਾ ਛੇ ਸ਼ਾਸਤ੍ਰਾ ਦਾ ਕਥਨ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: That fortunate woman was engrossed in arts and absorbed in Shastras she was the devotee of her Lord.304.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਆਪਣੇ ਪਤੀ ਦੀ ਭਗਤੀ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ ॥੩੦੪॥
ਜਾ ਰੰਭਾ ਹੈ, ਜਾ ਸਚੀ ਹੈ,
ਜਾ ਬ੍ਰਹਮਾ ਦੀ ਰਚੀ ਹੋਈ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was looking like Rambha, Shachi, the special creation of Brahma, Gandharva woman or the daughter of Vidyadhars.305.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਵਿਦਿਆਧਰ (ਦੇਵਤਿਆਂ ਵਿਚੋਂ ਕਿਸੇ ਦੀ) ਧੀ-ਭੈਣ ਜਾ ਇਸਤਰੀ ਹੈ ॥੩੦੫॥
ਜਾ ਹੰਸ ਦੀ ਸੁਆਮਨੀ (ਭਾਵ ਸਰਸਵਤੀ) ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She, seemed swinging like Rambha, Urvashi and Shachi.306.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਹਿੰਡੋਲ ਰਾਗ ਦੀ ਰਾਗਨੀ ਹੈ ॥੩੦੬॥
ਜਾ ਵਿਦਿਆਧਰੀ (ਦੇਵਤਿਆਂ ਵਿਚੋਂ ਕਿਸੇ ਦੀ) ਧੀ, ਭੈਣ ਜਾ ਇਸਤਰੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She looked like a Gandharva woman, like the daughter of Vidyadhars or the queen combined with royal glory.307.
She seemed like a princes or like Parvati, the beloved of Rudra and seemed like pure light-incarnate.308.
She was a fascinating beautiful woman

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਆਕਰਸ਼ਣ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲੀ ਸ਼ਕਤੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She appeared like a mercurial woman, portrait-like and glorious.309.
She was looking beautiful like the rivers, Ganges, Yamuna and Sarasvati or the city of Dwarka.310.
She was looking like Yamuna, Kankala, Kameshwari and Indrani.311.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਡਰ ਨੂੰ ਨਸ਼ਟ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was the destroyer of fear, a pillar-like damsel, a spring-lady or an authoritative woman.312.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਧਰਮ ਦੀ ਅਧਿਕਾਰੀ ਇਸਤਰੀ ਹੈ ॥੩੧੨॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was illustrious, pure and like enlightning effulgence
She was a glorious fairy.313.
She was glorious like the moon and the sun

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਸੂਰਜ ਦੀ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was supremely immaculate and radiant.314,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਬਹੁਤ ਚਮਕ ਦਮਕ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ ॥੩੧੪॥
ਜਾ ਨਾਗਨ ਵਰਗੀਆਂ ਜ਼ੁਲਫ਼ਾ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was a Naga-girl and the destroyer of all sufferings

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਦੁਖਾ ਨੂੰ ਕਟਣ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was mercurial and glorious.315.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਬੁੱਧੀ ਨੂੰ ਧਾਰਨ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was Sarasvati-incarnate, destroyer of anger, having long hair

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਕ੍ਰੋਧ ਨੂੰ ਨਸ਼ਟ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was like the flash of lighning.316.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਛਤ੍ਰ ਨੂੰ ਧਾਰਨ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was a Kshatriya woman, a canopied queen and a glorious and beautiful damsel like the canopy.317.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਤੀਰਾ ਵਰਗੀਆਂ ਅੱਖਾ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,
ਜਾ ਹਿਰਨ ਵਰਗੀਆਂ ਅੱਖਾ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,
ਜਾ ਕਮਲ ਫੁਲ ਦੀ ਪ੍ਰਭੁਤਾ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Her doe-like eyes worked like arrows and she was pretty like the radiance of lotus or the moonbeams.318.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਚੰਦ੍ਰਮਾ ਵਰਗੇ ਮੁਖ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ ॥੩੧੮॥
ਜਾ ਵਿਦਿਆਧਰ (ਦੇਵਤਿਆਂ ਦੀ) ਪੁੱਤਰੀ, ਭੈਣ ਜਾ ਇਸਤਰੀ ਹੈ,
ਜਾ ਬਸੰਤ ਰਾਗ ਦੀ ਰਾਗਨੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was a Gandharva woman or a Vidyadhar girl or the spring like lady or a beloved of all the people.319.
She was the beloved of Yadveshwar (Krishna) and a charming woman like Draupadi

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਪੰਚਾਲ ਦੇਸ਼ ਦੀ ਬਾਲਕਾ (ਦ੍ਰੋਪਦੀ) ਹੈ,
ਜਾ ਹਿੰਡੋਲ ਰਾਗ ਦੀ ਰਾਗਨੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She appeared like the chief queen swinging in a swing.320.
She, being studded with gold, seemed to be descending from the sky

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਆਕਾਸ਼ ਤੋਂ ਹੇਠਾ ਉਤਰੀ ਹੋਈ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was like a portrait of gold with the golden effulgence.321.
She was lotus-eyed with supreme radiance
She was a heroine with moon-like temperament spreading coolness.322.
She was radiant like the queen of Nagas

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਕਮਲ ਵਰਗੀਆਂ ਅੱਖਾ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Her eyes were like those of a doe or lotus.323.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਹਿਰਨੀ ਦੀਆਂ (ਅੱਖਾ ਦੇ ਮਾਣ ਨੂੰ) ਮਸਲਣ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ ॥੩੨੩॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was a unique one with infinite radiance

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਾ ਕਲੰਕ ਤੋਂ ਰਹਿਤ ਰੂਪ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Her unblemished beauty was the king of all the kings.324.
